description:
A multithreaded batch image processor for Windows.

ImBatch is a free multithreaded image processing tool for your Windows PC. With the help of ImBatch, users can perform a variety of complex image editing tasks; applying those changes to hundreds of images at once. Whether youâ€™re looking to crop, resize, rotate, add/remove tags or convert image format, ImBatch provides users with dozens of editing tools.
- added Has_IPTC_Tags_B and Has_EXIF_Tags_B to the available functions for the "Filter" task
- fixed IPTC tag encoding issue
- optimized "Deskew Text" task
- fixed logging and wrong folders with the "Preserve Structure" option turned on in the "Upload to FTP" task
- force UTF-8 encoding for saving options
- fixed getting the optimal threads amount value
- a lot of minor issues were fixed
